casebody.data:
2002-0248 (La. 10/25/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Bennett B. PIERRE. No. 2002-K-0248. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Pierre, Bennett B.; — Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of St. Tammany, 22nd Judicial District Court Div. E, No. 280,406; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2001 KA 0735.

Denied.
